```{r}
bb <- read.csv("lahman-batting.csv")
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


Which players have gotten the most hits since 2000?
```{r}
yearhits = bb %>% filter(yearID >= 2000) %>% select(playerID, H) %>% group_by(playerID) %>% arrange(desc(H))
yearhits
```

```{r}
ggplot(yearhits, aes(x=playerID))+geom_bar(aes(weight=H))
```

Which teams have scored the most runs since 1998 when the 30 current teams are in play?

```{r}
run= bb %>% filter(yearID>=1998) %>% group_by(playerID)
ggplot(run, aes(x=yearID, y=R))+geom_point()+facet_wrap(~teamID)
```
